code: import React from"react";import{FaHeart,FaShoppingCart}from"react-icons/fa";import"../styles/ProductCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product,addToCart,toggleFavorite,isLiked,navigate}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHeart,{className:`like-icon ${isLiked?"liked":""}`,onClick:()=>toggleFavorite(product)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:5001${product.image_url}`,alt:product.nom,className:"product-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.nom}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-brand",children:product.brand}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[product.prix," CAD"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-to-cart",onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaShoppingCart,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-more",onClick:navigate,children:"Voir plus"})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
